snippet.title: Meeple Station - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to explore gorgeous solar systems, fight off deadly pirates and discover the mystery of the Meeple's past,  when the sci-fi space simulation Meeple Station launches out of early access on April 10th 2020! 

Developed by Vox Games and published by Modularity Games, learn more here - https://meeplestation.com/

Buy Meeple Station on Steam and DRM free on itch.io:

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/900010/Meeple_Station/
itch.io - https://voxgames.itch.io/meeple-station

Follow Vox Games and join their Discord to be part of the Meeple Station community:

Discord - https://discord.meeplestation.com/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Meeplestation/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/VoxGamesAU
